mapper.select: select ui.id ,ui.name ,ui.nickname ,(SELECT count(result_code) FROM report_proc rp right join report_reg rr on rp.reg_code = rr.code inner join reply rpy on rr.reply_code = rpy.code where ui.user_code = rpy.user_code and result_code = 1) as cnt ,(SELECT if(count(result_code) >= 3, '정지', '정상') FROM report_proc rp right join report_reg rr on rp.reg_code = rr.code inner join reply rpy on rr.reply_code = rpy.code where ui.user_code = rpy.user_code and result_code = 1) as state ,u.reg_dt from user_info ui inner join user u on ui.user_code = u.code order by u.reg_dt

select ui.id, ui.name, ui.nickname, rp.dt, if(count(rp.result_code) is not null, count(rp.result_code), 0) as cnt from user_info ui inner join user u on ui.user_code = u.code left join reply rpy on u.code = rpy.user_code left join report_reg rr on rpy.code = rr.reply_code left join report_proc rp on rr.code = rp.reg_code where rp.result_code = 1 group by ui.id having cnt >= 3 order by rp.dt;

select d.id, d.name, d.nickname, d.dt, if(d.code is not null, '탈퇴', '정상') as state, (SELECT count(result_code) FROM report_proc rp right join report_reg rr on rp.reg_code = rr.code inner join reply rpy on rr.reply_code = rpy.code where d.user_code = rpy.user_code and result_code = 1) as cnt from user u join `drop` d on u.code = d.user_code left join reply rpy on u.code = rpy.user_code left join report_reg rr on rpy.code = rr.reply_code left join report_proc rp on rr.code = rp.reg_code group by d.id order by u.reg_dt;

select (select name from user_info where user_code = rr.user_code) as reportUser, ui.name as reportedUser, rpy.content, case when rr.type_code = 1 then '스팸홍보/도배' when rr.type_code = 2 then '음란물' when rr.type_code = 3 then '불법정보' when rr.type_code = 4 then '청소년유해' when rr.type_code = 5 then '욕설/혐오/차별' when rr.type_code = 6 then '개인정보노출' when rr.type_code = 7 then '불쾌한표현' else '반려' end as reason, rr.dt, rr.code from report_proc rp right join report_reg rr on rp.reg_code = rr.code inner join reply rpy on rr.reply_code = rpy.code inner join user_info ui on rpy.user_code = ui.user_code where rp.result_code is null

select (select name from user_info where user_code = rr.user_code) as reportUser, ui.name as reportedUser, rpy.content, case when rr.type_code = 1 then '스팸홍보/도배' when rr.type_code = 2 then '음란물' when rr.type_code = 3 then '불법정보' when rr.type_code = 4 then '청소년유해' when rr.type_code = 5 then '욕설/혐오/차별' when rr.type_code = 6 then '개인정보노출' when rr.type_code = 7 then '불쾌한표현' else '반려' end as reason, if(rp.result_code=1, '블라인드', '공개') as state, rp.dt, rr.code from report_proc rp right join report_reg rr on rp.reg_code = rr.code inner join reply rpy on rr.reply_code = rpy.code inner join user_info ui on rpy.user_code = ui.user_code where rp.result_code is not null

SELECT date_format(reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') as date , count(*) as cnt FROM user WHERE date_format(reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) and NOW() GROUP BY date_format(reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY date_format(reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT date_format(reg_dt,'%Y-%m') as date ,count(*) as cnt FROM user WHERE date_format(reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_sub(now(), interval 3 month) AND now() GROUP BY date_format(reg_dt,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY date_format(reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report_proc(reg_code, result_code, admin_code) VALUES(#{reg_code}, #{result_code}, #{admin_code})
